task.summary: Re-factor custom menu support into OpusPrimusNavigation class

Make @package name consistent as 'OpusPrimus' (no underscore separation)

Add LESS elements for fade styles and start Table of Contents within style.less
Fix issue with last_user no longer in database scenario.
Add clearances to LESS and .post-title element

Add a few general LESS items; change comment reply script hook
Basic FAQ and License Verbiage updates

More arguments and parameters; fixed div inside p issue.
Updates to 404; code clean up and documentation of classes.
Reduced naming prefixes where not required (see classes)
Added $content_width reference and a few todo items
Added default RSS widget styles; remove some comments from LESS file
Added Text Widget and Tag Cloud styles
Changed content-wrapper container to include sidebars
Modify line height in the byline and add select as a percentage (over-riding bootstrap's static width)

Updated sidebar list styles to match new layout CSS elements

Specified static public for `gallery_single_only` and added $instance
Added conditional check for post-format:gallery to `gallery_single_only`
Added post-format: gallery loop (and some minor style for it)
Added `return_blank` and removed gallery filter as not needed
Added links and i18n support to the text in secondary images
Added `image_exif`; add 'image' template; adjusted post-coda style
Set featured-image img height property to auto to maintain aspect ratio

Fix aspect ratios for smaller viewport in desktop browser
Make the post-format text into a button

Adjust layout to set min-width of the-loop=520px (needs testing); linked post-format buttons to archive; modified archive to follow standard index structure.
Add general display for EXIF data; remove related functions from OpusPrimusGallery
Revert split column layout and add Jetpack CSS hack
Moved menus out of navigation class into 'functions'; fixed no default menu issue
Add "show_mod_author=true" to page byline as the default
Fix broken current day box if at beginning or end of week.
Change to a small subset of Bootstrap CSS; remove Bootstrap.js; remove Boostrap image files

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Change to a small subset of Bootstrap CSS; remove Bootstrap.js; remove Boostrap image files

MESSAGE.value: IDE update
Added `return_blank` and removed gallery filter as not needed
Added links and i18n support to the text in secondary images
Move "Miscellaneous Functions" back into 'functions.php'
Calendar navigation fix
Added `image_exif`; add 'image' template; adjusted post-coda style
Set featured-image img height property to auto to maintain aspect ratio
Fix aspect ratios for smaller viewport in desktop browser
Sidebar content margin
Make the post-format text into a button
Fix the logic to display the post-format text button correctly
Adjust layout to set min-width of the-loop=520px (needs testing); linked post-format buttons to archive; modified archive to follow standard index structure.
Add new class (partial) 'OpusPrimusImage'
Add new class (90% complete) 'OpusPrimusImages'
Re-integrate the LESS script files
Add general display for EXIF data; remove related functions from OpusPrimusGallery
Added 'archive-image'
Remove test message
Modified Archive Image (Attached) layout
Revert split column layout and add Jetpack CSS hack
Moved menus out of navigation class into 'functions'; fixed no default menu issue

Added customizable sticky note flag
Fix broken current day box if at beginning or end of week.
